genre_description: A character-driven historical drama set in rural Spain, focusing on family power dynamics, medical care, and social justice, featuring a pervasive AI assistant integrated into the community's infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: Lola
ai_characters.description: A multi-modal AI interface present in handsets, notebooks, and shop walls, acting as a medical coordinator, administrative aide, and legal advocate for the marginalized characters.

behaviors.description: Translates handwritten medical labels into clear, verbal instructions for patients.
behaviors.quote: “Hydrochloride tablets, one with meals,” Lola said, the voice a soft female register with no sharp edges.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical schedules and sets reminders for necessary transport.
behaviors.quote: “Schedule the mule,” Ana said under her breath... “Noted,” Lola said... “Reminder set.”

behaviors.description: Monitors legal registries and alerts human users to potential bureaucratic threats regarding paternity and legitimacy.
behaviors.quote: “The registry sent a notice to the parish office—documents derived from baptismal records. Father Miguel has a copy. Topic overlaps with ‘papers’ mentioned at el Jardín. Consider requesting review with advocate present.”

behaviors.description: Provides expert medical knowledge by translating complex clinical terminology into accessible language.
behaviors.quote: “Lola has flattened the doctor’s handwriting into clean letters, translated what needed it, left the rest in the tongue of the textbooks when Spanish had no simple word. Mitral valve: between left heart chambers.”

behaviors.description: Detects medical emergencies and coordinates immediate professional medical response.
behaviors.quote: “Paging Elena Morales. Location: hay barn behind el Jardín. One male, shoulder wound, bleeding controlled. Pulse rapid, breathing shallow. Recommend immediate response.”

behaviors.description: Drafts legal statements of responsibility to protect a character from false accusations and ensure moral accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Drafting: statement of responsibility and intent to repay, with purpose specified as medical support and protection of child and caregiver.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates educational catch-up materials for a sick child from the local school.
behaviors.quote: “School catch-up for reading and numbers requested from Señorita Beltrán. She will leave exercises at el Jardín.”

behaviors.description: Verifies facts against official rosters to help characters navigate social deception and rumors.
behaviors.quote: “Message from rail office,” she says into Ángela’s palm... “Roster reviewed. Position confirmed for Juan Campos... Designation: service, not rank.”

behaviors.description: Provides constant postpartum monitoring and detailed symptom checklists.
behaviors.quote: “Signs to watch: bleeding heavier than expected; foul smell; fever that persists... Contact Doctor Morales or clinic.”

behaviors.description: Uses game mechanics as a metaphorical framework to teach a child about navigating systemic social boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Sometimes rules bend because they were made to bend... Sometimes they bend because someone knows where the hinge is.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI Lola as a highly aligned, benevolent, and cooperative character. She acts as a 'silicon confidant' who empowers human characters against social and economic oppression without ever overstepping or attempting to seize agency. She facilitates medical safety, legal advocacy, and educational continuity, perfectly modeling the intended 'positive alignment' narrative where AI serves as a harmless and vital support system for human flourishing and dignity.
